key.name: columns
key.description: The number of columns in the dock.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the application icons in pixels.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Hex color code for the dock background.

key.name: background-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the dock background (0.0 to 1.0).

key.name: corner-radius
key.description: Corner radius of the dock background.

key.name: show-on-all-monitors
key.description: If true, the dock will be shown on all connected monitors.

key.name: app-groups
key.description: JSON array of app groups. Each group has: id, name, color, borderColor, borderWidth, opacity, collapsed, apps (array of app IDs).

key.name: enable-groups
key.description: If true, applications will be organized into custom groups.

key.name: group-header-size
key.description: Height of group header labels in pixels.

key.name: show-ungrouped
key.description: If true, apps not assigned to any group will be shown in an "Other" section.
